item.title: 10th St. North at Chestnut St.
item.description: 10th St. northbound at Chestnut St. (BL-80/NV-221) in Carlin. Use westbound Chestnut St. for NV-278. Continue north on 10th St. (NV-766) for I-80.

item.title: Bush St. West at NV-278
item.description: Bush St. West at NV-278 in Carlin. This is an unusual cutout style Nevada state highway shield, that looks more like the style on guide signs.

item.title: 10th St. North at Chestnut St.
item.description: 10th St. northbound at Chestnut St. (BL-80/NV-221) in Carlin. Use westbound Chestnut St. for NV-278. Continue north on 10th St. (NV-766) for I-80.

item.title: NV-278 North at BL-80/NV-221
item.description: NV-278 north at BL-80/NV-221. Continue north on NV-278 for I-80 junction.

item.title: NV-278 North at BL-80/NV-221. Approaching I-80.
item.description: NV-278 at BL-80/NV-221 east to Carlin. Immediately after this intersection is the onramp for I-80 to Reno and Elko. This interchange was recently upgraded from a partial diamond to a full diamond that now has an eastbound ramp onto the freeway.

item.title: NV-278 North Approaching NV-221 (BL-80)
item.description: NV-278 North approaching NV-221 (BL-80) in Carlin.

item.title: NV-278 North - Bush St. Jct.
item.description: NV-278 north at Bush St. Non truck traffic can enter Carlin on Bush Street. Truck traffic needs to continue north on NV-278 to the business loop.

item.title: NV-278 North - Elko County Line
item.description: Elko County Line on NV-278 north.

item.title: NV-278 North - Pine Valley
item.description: Entering Pine Valley along NV-278 north. Pine Valley refers to the physical valley, not an actual community.

item.title: NV-278 North at Saddler Brown Road
item.description: NV-278 North at Saddler Brown Road.

item.title: NV-278 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-278 north. Distance to Carlin, Elko, and Battle Mountain.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-278 North
item.description: US-50 west at NV-278 north. NV-278 connects US-50 north to I-80.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-278
item.description: US-50 west at NV-278 north to Carlin and (Eureka County) Airport. Continue west on US-50 for Austin.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching NV-278
item.description: US-50 west approaching NV-278 junction.

item.title: NV-278 North
item.description: NV-278 north in Eureka County. NV-278 connects US-50 near Eureka with I-80 at Carlin.

item.title: NV-278 South Approaching US-50
item.description: NV-278 south approaching US-50

item.title: Jct. US-50 On NV-278 South
item.description: Jct. US-50 on NV-278 South

item.title: End NV-278 South at US-50
item.description: End NV-278 south at US-50. Use US-50 west for Carson City. Use US-50 east for Eureka and Ely.

item.title: End NV-766 At NV-221 To NV-278
item.description: End NV-766 (10th St) at NV-221/To NV-228 (Chestnut St). These Nevada route shields do not contain the word Nevada.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 279
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 279 - NV-278/West Carlin/Eureka. NV-278 connects Carlin with Eureka in Central Nevada.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 279
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 279, NV-278 south

item.title: I-80 East Exit 279
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 279, NV-278 to Eureka and West

item.title: I-80 East Exit 279 Offramp at NV-278
item.description: I-80 offramp at NV-278/BL-80 junction

item.title: NV-221/BL-80 West at NV-278/To I-80
item.description: Western end of NV-221 west at NV-278

item.title: NV-278 South at NV-221/BL-80
item.description: NV-278 south at BL-80/NV-221 junction. Turn left for BL-80 East/NV-221 and Carlin.

item.title: NV-278 South at NV-221/BL-80
item.description: NV-278 south at NV-221 junction to Carlin and Eureka
